source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SEQ_00<tab>Maenne requires your help taking aetheric readings in new locations.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SEQ_00<tab>Maenne aimerait vous envoyer en mission.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SEQ_01<tab>Maenne's scouts have reported several locations that appear to have been host to ancient battles, and have been tasked with obtaining readings of the sites' aetheric levels. However, the scouts scarce have the time to take accurate readings on account of the dragons stalking the area. Maenne asks you to help the scouts and bids you meet the scouting party near Sothton Walls. Speak with the southern scouting party dragoon to see what he requires.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SEQ_01<tab>Maenne vous a appris que ses hommes avaient du mal à exécuter leur mission à cause de dragons. Elle aimerait que vous assistiez l'équipe qui se trouve au sud dans un premier temps. Allez aux Remparts de Sudbourg et parlez à l'éclaireur de l'équipe sud.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SEQ_02<tab>The diresaurs that hulk about the area are proving to be a nuisance, preventing the scouting party from securely setting up their aetherometers. Distract them and slay three of the beasts so the dragoons can set up the aetherometers undistracted.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SEQ_02<tab>Le soldat vous a expliqué que des <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20E2D0302 /var> les empêchaient de mener à bien leur mission. Éliminez-en trois pour les aider.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SEQ_03<tab>Your fight against the diresaurs provides much-needed exercise for you, and a much-needed distraction to the beleaguered dragoons. Return to the scouting party dragoon and confirm that they were able to safely set up their aetherometers.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez tué les dragons comme demandé. Allez l'annoncer à l'éclaireur.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SEQ_04<tab>The dragoons were able to set up the aetherometers without incident, and express some regret that they are unable to see you fight for longer.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SEQ_04<tab>Les <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20E2D0302 /var> vaincus, l'homme a pu mettre en place les éthérimètres, ceci grâce à vous.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the southern scouting party dragoon.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_TODO_00<tab>Parler à l'éclaireur de l'équipe sud

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_TODO_02<tab>Report to the southern scouting party dragoon.
TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_AIRPORTINVESTIGATOR01871_000_003<tab>Our scouts have discovered sites that seem to have been host to ancient battles. To imagine the carnage that must have been wrought there...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_AIRPORTINVESTIGATOR01871_000_003<tab>Mes camarades partis en recon<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce ont découvert une sorte d'ancienne arène ou de théâtre antique, près d'ici. Les gradins de pierre sont encadrés de plusieurs majestueux escaliers.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_MAENNE_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, while you were assisting our scouts to the northeast, two locations were discovered to the west that appear to be ancient battlefields. I think these would be ideal places to take aetheric measurements.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_MAENNE_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Dame)) ((Sire)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Pendant que vous étiez parti<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> au nord-est, nous avons découvert qu'il y avait deux arènes anciennes à l'ouest. Or, j'aimerais que nous prenions des mesures des courants éthérés à ces points hautement stratégiques.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_MAENNE_000_001<tab>I've sent scouts to each location already, but the ever-present threat of attack makes it difficult for them to obtain accurate readings. Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ensure their safety whilst they perform their duties.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_MAENNE_000_001<tab>J'ai bien entendu dépêché des hommes sur place, mais visiblement, les monstres les empêchent de mener à bien leur mission. Est-ce que je peux vous demander d'aller les assister<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_MAENNE_000_002<tab>Head to Sothton Walls first, and meet with my scout. He'll let you know what's required of you.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_MAENNE_000_002<tab>Commencez par l'équipe du sud<var 1D /var>; rejoignez-les aux Remparts de Sudbourg et aidez-les.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_MAENNE_000_013<tab>My scout to the west will tell you what aid we require.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_MAENNE_000_013<tab>Des monstres empêchent mes hommes de mener à bien leur mission. Est-ce que je peux vous demander d'aller les assister<var 1D /var>? Commencez par l'équipe du sud<var 1D /var>; rejoignez-les aux Remparts de Sudbourg et aidez-les.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SOUTHINVESTIGATOR01879_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Maenne sent word of your arrival. Your strength shall prove to be a tremendous help to our work.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SOUTHINVESTIGATOR01879_000_010<tab>Oh, c'est vous qui venez nous aider<var 1D /var>! Ouf<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SOUTHINVESTIGATOR01879_000_011<tab>This area is crawling with diresaurs, making it impossible to set up the aetherometers to obtain accurate readings.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SOUTHINVESTIGATOR01879_000_011<tab>Ces maudits <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20E2D0302 /var> ne veulent pas nous lâcher<var 1D /var>! Impossible d'exécuter nos ordres dans ces conditions...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SOUTHINVESTIGATOR01879_000_012<tab>We need you to provide a distraction while we set up the aetherometers. If you slay three of them that should provide us ample time.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SOUTHINVESTIGATOR01879_000_012<tab>Pourriez-vous vaincre disons trois <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20E2D0302 /var> pendant que nous installons les éthérimètres<var 1D /var>? Cela devrait nous donner assez de répit pour cela.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SOUTHINVESTIGATOR01879_000_020<tab>It shouldn't take long to finish setting up the aetherometers; we should be done by the time you slay three of them!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SOUTHINVESTIGATOR01879_000_020<tab>Ces maudits <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20E2D0302 /var> ne veulent pas nous lâcher<var 1D /var>! Comment voulez-vous travailler dans des conditions pareilles... Pourriez-vous vaincre disons trois <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20E2D0302 /var> pendant que nous installons les éthérimètres<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SOUTHINVESTIGATOR01879_000_030<tab>Roar and gnash their teeth as they might, the diresaurs were no match for the likes of you. We managed to set up the aetherometers without incident─although I must admit it would've been a treat to see you fight for a bit longer.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ611_01879_SOUTHINVESTIGATOR01879_000_030<tab>Ah, merci, vous nous avez vraiment aidés<var 1D /var>! Les éthérimètres sont en place, et c'est grâce à vous<var 1D /var>! J'espère que mes camarades vous prendront comme modèle.
